title: login bug
body: The Client crashed loading into an ARAM game and now wont let me log back in. i reset my info and it let me log in on here just fine, it also reset the client to last login screen with Khazix. no clue what to do with this bullshit

replies.body:
That's a little weird if the client won't let you sign in but the support site will o_O. If you haven't yet, try closing and reopening the client to see if that lets you back in. 

I also want to touch on why that crash happened in the first place. If you saw a bugsplat message, make sure to go through the steps in our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) to hit the common reasons those can happen.

i used the fix tool in the login screen it did fix the login problem but now it says my DirectX may be out of date and tells me to check my graphics drivers if they are up to date and they are so im gonna reinstall it.
